titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for a 5-year carryback of operating losses of small businesses, and for other purposes.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow for a 5-year carryback of operating losses of small businesses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill allows certain small businesses (fewer than 250 employees) a 5-year carryback of net operating losses incurred in 2020 due to COVID-19 (i.e., the coronavirus disease 2019).
